translation: The threefold fruit of action (evil, good, and mixed) accrues after death to those who do not abandon it, but never to those who do.
commentary: 18.12 unwished or disagreeable or evil? Ishtam wished or agreeable or good? mixed mixed? f and? threefold threefold? Karmanah of action? fruit fruit? Does it accrue? renunciants to nonrenouncers? Pretya after death? Not not? You but? Sannyasinam to renouncers? somewhere ever.Commentary One fruit (of action) is pleasant? is another unpleasant? while the third is a mixture of both. Those in whom
